title: Orliris 120MG Cap 1x10 (L)
details: This medication helps in losing weight
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Chronic malabsorption syndrome, Cholestasis, Hypothyroidism, Calcium oxalate kidney stones, Hyperoxaluria, certain eating disorders Anorexia nervosa/bulimia, HIV infection, Seizures. This medication must not be used during pregnancy. Weight loss offers no potential benefit to a pregnant woman and may harm an unborn baby.
effects: Changes in your bowel function often occur because of the unabsorbed fat. Fatty/oily stool, Oily spotting, Intestinal gas with discharge, a Feeling of needing to have a bowel movement right away, Increased number of bowel movements, or Poor bowel control may occur.

title: Orlis 120MG Cap 6x5 (L)
details:
Orlis Capsule is also known as Orlistat. The essential element for which it is used is that it treats Obesity. That means it is used by people that are willing to lose their weight with the consultation of a doctor. It is mainly for overweig

READ MORE
precautions: Before anyone takes Orlistat, they should tell their doctor if they are allergic to anything because Orlis capsules contain some ingredients that are not active and if they are taken without the consultation of the doctor they could react badly. Special instructions are given to the patients that have a medical history of heart and blood pressure issues. Also, the diabatic patient needs to tell their doctor about their medical condition so that the doctor can give it in a basic quantity that would be more effective and less risky.
effects: The point that this medication works best regarding losing weight for obese people that were over-weight because of some medical factors but also it has a lot of side effects that include some critical and severe effects like:Heart diseaseBlood pressureDiabetesFurthermore, the thing that affects the most is that the body cannot absorb and develop fats anymore because of Orlis. That's why the body reacts to it. It is said to work out in the days when the patient is having orlis capsules so that in minimum time maximum weight can be reduced. But otherwise, if the patient takes this medication and has the effects that are mentioned below, just straight tell your doctors:VomitingNauseaAbdominal PainStomach painDark-colored urineYellowing of eyes and skinBack painsOrlistat also causes some allergic reactions that include: rash, itching, trouble in taking a breath, and dizziness. If these symptoms are felt, then the patient should consult the doctor as soon as possible.
